channel.title: DLG Mechatronics Sp. z o.o. High-Tech R&D subsidiary of PRO VITA Group.
channel.description: DLG Mechatronics Sp. z o.o. High-Tech R&D subsidiary of PRO VITA Group.

item.title: Current R&D Project :
item.description:
Current R&D Project :

The first project realized by DLG Mechatronics is the development of POC (Portable Oxygen Concentrator) supporting therapy for people touched by COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease) . The device will be characterized by innovative approach with respect to intuitive system and improvement of patient’s safety.

item.title: Company:
item.description:
Company:

DLG Mechatronics is a subsidiary company of Pro Vita Polska Sp. z o. o. Sp. k., which is one of the leaders in Poland in the range of implementation of innovative systems for pulmonology, medical imaging, neurosurgical intraoperative navigation and 3D endoscopic imaging. Over 14 years of experience resulted in establishment of a special purpose entity for realization of Research & Development work of innovative medical products.
